26858f71-07d2-4b38-b1e2-b290e702a97c.name: Long-Range Smell
26858f71-07d2-4b38-b1e2-b290e702a97c.notes: Allows you to use the Long-Distance range penalties for Smell rolls.

af8e8b39-76fd-46e6-8245-9aa2d73bae87.name: Musical Voice
af8e8b39-76fd-46e6-8245-9aa2d73bae87.notes: +1 to reaction rolls after you speak for an extended period (at least a minute in regular conversation), or after a successful performance using Performance, Public Speaking, Singing, etc.

bd031ec4-3eab-4bdf-8957-a88014c717d3.name: Occult Exorcist
bd031ec4-3eab-4bdf-8957-a88014c717d3.notes: Allows you to ignore the requirement of having Blessed, Power Investiture, or True Faith to avoid the -4 to rolls for Exorcism, but requires you to succeed on an Occultism or Hidden Lore roll to identify what sort of spirit you’re dealing with. Those with Blessed, Power Investiture, or True Faith can spend that point elsewhere.

4557c5d6-4cdb-4cb8-9daf-ea375db308c6.name: On the Bounce
4557c5d6-4cdb-4cb8-9daf-ea375db308c6.notes: You can ignore up to -1/level in bulk when firing weapons while jumping when operating a battlesuit, minimum of -1.

5333d77a-8dcd-4b76-ab2a-0478935e2d88.name: Political Doublespeak
5333d77a-8dcd-4b76-ab2a-0478935e2d88.notes: Lets you use Politics as an Influence Skill.

cabb09bc-f5ee-42cf-8c3f-6602b39860cb.name: Seasoned Spacer
cabb09bc-f5ee-42cf-8c3f-6602b39860cb.notes: +1 on all DX, HT, Free Fall, Piloting, Spacer, and Vacc Suit rolls to resist personal (not vehicular) disasters aboard ship.

bc581782-a79c-4345-a11e-8730ee2832c6.name: Starry Eyes
bc581782-a79c-4345-a11e-8730ee2832c6.notes: Can use Performance as an Influence skill on anyone who has seen your work.

modifiers.name: Reaction Bonus
modifiers.notes: People who have read your work

5a7f6ea9-f93d-4555-889d-44eaca77ea48.name: Understanding Educator
5a7f6ea9-f93d-4555-889d-44eaca77ea48.notes: When you successfully use your Empathy advantage, add +3 to your Teaching rolls (+1 for Sensitive).
